amendment.description: Amendment earmarks $12 million for research on the comparative effectiveness, cost effectiveness, and safety of drugs, biological products, and devices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that $12 million shall be available for the conduct of research on the comparative effectiveness, cost-effectiveness, and safety of drugs, biological products and devices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
